LanguageData.RT_HD2FRV_Vehicle_Blueprint.label: M-102 Fast Reconnaissance Vehicle
LanguageData.RT_HD2FRV_Vehicle_Blueprint.description:
M-102 is a light armored reconnaissance vehicle equipped with the MG-206 heavy machine gun and an automatic transmission. It is deeply loved by helldivers for its characteristics of low cost, brittle armor, high speed and easy overturning.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x3 gunner x1 
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel
